plot: An autistic girl unknowingly has the key behind her fathers abduction. Will the police be able to decipher her cryptic poems in time to find her father?
title: Broken Pieces
plot_es: An autistic girl unknowingly has the key behind her fathers abduction. Will the police be able to decipher her cryptic poems in time to find her father?
plot_en: An autistic girl unknowingly has the key behind her fathers abduction. Will the police be able to decipher her cryptic poems in time to find her father?
